name: Dashlabs.ai
headline: Software for medical laboratories and clinics
description:
We write software for diagnostic laboratories. We provide the following:

- Cashier system
- Booking system
- Integration with clinical medical instruments (hematology analyzers, chemistry analyzers)
- Integration with imaging equipment (DICOM enabled x-rays, ultrasounds)
- Automatic generation of test results
- Secure sharing of test results with employers and manpower agencies (to help them meet country-specific regulatory requirements)

founders.name: Martin Gomez, Founder
founders.description: COO and Co-Founder, Dashlabs.ai. More than happy to connect towards collaborative efforts in sustainably making the world a better place.

# Work faster
## with medical software for healthcare organizations
Dashlabs.ai provides a highly efficient, cloud-based Laboratory Information System (LIS) designed to meet the needs of medical institutions of all sizes. From small diagnostic labs to large hospitals, Dashlabs.ai streamlines healthcare operations with scalable software solutions.
[Start for free](https://dashlabs.ai/<https:/www.dashlabs.app>)[Contact Sales](https://dashlabs.ai/</contact>)
![Dashlabs.ai is an efficient, cloud-based laboratory information system \(LIS\) for modern medical institutions of all sizes.](https://dashlabs.ai/_next/static/media/hero_image.d88a510f.png)
### Our solutions help over 100+ organizations work faster
[Watch Demo](https://dashlabs.ai/<https:/www.youtube.com/shorts/6mkpS3KF5m0>)
#### Patient Admission
##### Online Patient Registration Form
Allow patients to register online with an easy-to-use form. Automatically save data to the Electronic Health Record (EHR) system, streamlining the registration process and reducing manual errors.
[Learn more about Online Patient Registration Form](https://dashlabs.ai/</solutions/online-patient-registration-form>)
##### Cashier Module
Easily create sales transactions that generate Electronic Medical Records (EMR). You can also split payments between HMOs, APE clients, and various payment modes.
[Learn more about Cashier Module](https://dashlabs.ai/</solutions/cashier-module>)
[Start for free](https://dashlabs.ai/<https:/www.dashlabs.app>)
#### Patient and Results Processing
##### Electronic Health Records (EHR)
Securely store and manage comprehensive patient records, keeping all patient data organized and easily accessible.
[Learn more about Electronic Health Records (EHR)](https://dashlabs.ai/</solutions/electronic-health-records>)
##### Electronic Medical Records (EMR)
Manage patient results and records through our seamless EMR platform, designed for fast and secure data access.
[Learn more about Electronic Medical Records (EMR)](https://dashlabs.ai/</solutions/electronic-health-records>)
##### Results Input Forms
Input patient results for various services, including lab tests (Hematology, Clinical Chemistry, Serology, etc.), imaging services (X-Ray, ECG, Ultrasound), consultations, physical exams, and e-prescriptions.
[Learn more about Results Input Forms](https://dashlabs.ai/</solutions/results-input-forms>)
[Start for free](https://dashlabs.ai/<https:/www.dashlabs.app>)
#### Results and Reports Generation
##### Download and email PDF results
Easily download and email patient results as PDFs for quick sharing and record-keeping.
[Learn more about Download and email PDF results](https://dashlabs.ai/</solutions/download-pdf-results>)
##### Sales and Patient Census Reports
Generate daily, weekly, or monthly sales and census reports. Meet regulatory requirements with DOH laboratory logbook reports.
[Learn more about Sales and Patient Census Reports](https://dashlabs.ai/</solutions/sales-patients-operations-reports>)
[Start for free](https://dashlabs.ai/<https:/www.dashlabs.app>)
#### Machine Integration
##### Laboratory Information System (LIS)
Automate results transmission from lab machines, increasing accuracy and efficiency.
[Learn more about Laboratory Information System (LIS)](https://dashlabs.ai/</solutions/laboratory-information-system>)
##### Radiology Information System (RIS)
Connect your imaging machines for seamless results transmission.
[Learn more about Radiology Information System (RIS)](https://dashlabs.ai/</solutions/radiology-information-system>)
##### PACS and DICOM viewer
View DICOM files directly from Dashlabs.ai with our integrated PACS and DICOM viewer.
[Learn more about PACS and DICOM viewer](https://dashlabs.ai/</solutions/pacs-dicom-viewer>)
[Contact Sales](https://dashlabs.ai/</contact>)
#### Accounting and Ledgers
##### Track Revenue, Finances, and Expenses
Manage bank accounts, track expenses, and monitor financial transactions, with detailed debit and credit records.
##### Track HMO and APE client billing
Stay on top of HMO and APE billing to ensure timely payments from providers.
[Contact Sales](https://dashlabs.ai/</contact>)
Trusted by many medical organizationsprocessing over 10M+ patients
Dashlabs.ai's cloud-based LIS powers healthcare organizations such as diagnostic laboratories, medical centers, veterinary clinics, dialysis centers, hospitals, and corporate healthcare providers that conduct Annual Physical Exams (APE). Dashlabs.ai ensures seamless data management, patient processing, and reporting to improve overall workflow efficiency.
![Organizations that use Dashlabs.ai](https://dashlabs.ai/_next/static/media/orgs.41fd4026.png)
Create an account and start processing patients in minutes.
Start now and work faster
[Start for free](https://dashlabs.ai/<https:/www.dashlabs.app>)[View Pricing](https://dashlabs.ai/</pricing>)
![Dashlabs.ai](https://dashlabs.ai/_next/static/media/logo-white.eec9969c.png)

generated_description:
**Dashlabs.ai: Revolutionizing Healthcare Management**

Founded in 2020 in Manila, Philippines, Dashlabs.ai is a pioneering health-tech company developed to serve diagnostic laboratories and clinics. As part of Y Combinator's W21 batch, they’ve made impressive strides with a cohesive team of 30 employees.

The core mission of Dashlabs.ai is straightforward: to streamline healthcare operations through advanced software solutions. They address the specific needs of medical institutions of all sizes, from small diagnostic labs to large hospitals. Their platform provides a comprehensive Laboratory Information System (LIS) that integrates various functionalities, including:

- **Cashier and Booking Systems**: Simplifying transactions and appointments.
- **Integration with Medical Instruments and Imaging Equipment**: Directly connecting with hematology and chemistry analyzers, as well as DICOM-enabled imaging machines, for smooth data flow.
- **Automatic Generation of Test Results**: Reducing manual errors and saving time.
- **Secure Sharing of Test Results**: Ensuring compliance for employers and manpower agencies who need to meet regulatory standards.

Dashlabs.ai has already partnered with over 100 organizations, processing more than 10 million patients. This impressive activity highlights their platform's reliability and effectiveness in the healthcare sector. Beyond the clinical aspects, they also provide robust solutions for patient admissions, electronic health records (EHR), and comprehensive reporting capabilities, making administrative tasks more efficient.

The company is aptly tagged in the realms of health-tech, B2B, digital health, and healthcare IT—a testament to their multifaceted impact in the health sector.

As for their future plans, Dashlabs.ai continues to innovate and expand its offerings while remaining committed to improving healthcare workflows. Their user-friendly interface and focus on automation make it easier for healthcare providers to manage data, streamline processes, and enhance patient experience.

For more information or to start utilizing their services, check out their website at [dashlabs.ai](https://dashlabs.ai).

In summary, Dashlabs.ai is poised to redefine medical software for labs and clinics, making healthcare management faster, smarter, and more efficient. Whether you're a small clinic or a large hospital, they seem to have the tools to help you thrive in today's complex healthcare landscape.
